title: Susan Pengelly’s Book Draws on Decades of Mediumship Experience
text:
Experienced medium Susan Pengelly shares heartwarming true stories to help readers overcome their fear of death and inspire enlightened thinking in her new book, “ Satnav for Your Soul : Guidance from Those Who Have Made the Ultimate Journey” (published by Balboa Press). “In my capacity as a medium I have helped people deal with grief,” Pengelly says. “I was inspired to write this book to help allay the deep-seated fear of dying that so many people hold within, and to inspire living life fully and authentically, whatever your circumstances.”
“Satnav for Your Soul” features stories that chronicle Pengelly’s experiences over the past 20 years. This touching, at times funny and thought-provoking book, is filled with stories shared from communications with people who have died in a variety of circumstances including war, car crashes, murder and illnesses such as cancer and AIDS. In every chapter, a colorful cast of characters describe the feeling of peace they felt after “returning home.”
An excerpt from “Satnav for Your Soul”:
“I thought I’d tell you what it’s like, being what you call ‘dead’. Funny really, ‘cause we are more alive than you are; we can see everything you know, everything—even the stuff you don’t want us to! … I mean it is a bit odd at first, like being plonked in a foreign country. Everyone speaks the same language which is a help, but you don’t know your way around when everyone else seems to—a bit like your first day at senior school, only without the death grip on your bowels.”
“Satnav for Your Soul”
By Susan Pengelly

About the Author
Susan Pengelly lives in the region of North Devon, England, and teaches mediumship and meditation mind work. She is the founder and managing director of The English Psychic Company , hosting psychic suppers, ghostwalks, historic brothel walks, public and private events. She is also a grief counselor and a civil celebrant specializing in spiritual funeral ceremonies.
